articles.title: Elon Musk names Linda Yaccarino as new Twitter chief - Financial Times
articles.description: Former NBCUniversal advertising executive will take the helm as billionaire attempts to turn platform into ‘everything app’
articles.content:
Elon Musk said he has hired Linda Yaccarino, NBCUniversals former head of advertising, as Twitters new chief executive.
The billionaire has been Twitter chief executive since his $44bn acquisition o… [+3595 chars]

articles.title: Astronomers detect largest cosmic explosion ever seen - BBC
articles.description: Astronomers have discovered what they believe to be the largest explosion ever detected.
articles.content:
Astronomers have discovered what they believe to be the largest explosion ever detected. 
The explosion is more than 10 times brighter than any recorded exploding star - known as a supernova.

articles.title: UK economy limps along as high inflation hits spending - CNN
articles.description: The United Kingdom's economy limped along in the first quarter of this year as consumers spent less on services and strike action took its toll.
articles.content:
